abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column highlights elite performance of Simone Biles at United States gymnastics championships; observes Biles won her fourth consecutive national all-around gold and top spot in three of four individual events, marking her as major contender for Rio Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Marveling at Biles’s happy-go-lucky attitude could be its own Olympic sport after she won her fourth consecutive United States title in the all-around on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Atop Gymnastics World, With a Grin That Gleams of Gold
headline.main: Atop the Gymnastics World, Simone Biles Can’t Suppress Her Grin

snippet: Marveling at Biles’s happy-go-lucky attitude could be its own Olympic sport after she won her fourth consecutive United States title in the all-around on Sunday....
